{"id":1097626041,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 days, 15 hours","timestamp":1699848540,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"67 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1097626041/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sort Vowels in a String","memory":"15 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string ans=\"\";\n    string v=\"\";\n    map<char,int>mp;\n    map<char,int>newmp;\n    string sortVowels(string s) {\n        for(int i=0;i<5;i++){\n            mp['a']++;\n            mp['e']++;\n            mp['i']++;\n            mp['o']++;\n            mp['u']++;\n            mp['A']++;\n            mp['E']++;\n            mp['I']++;\n            mp['O']++;\n            mp['U']++;\n        }\n        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){\n            if(mp.find(s[i])!=mp.end()){\n                v+=s[i];\n                s[i]='0';\n            }\n            else{newmp[s[i]]=i;}\n        }\n\n        sort(v.begin(),v.end());\n\n        int a=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++){\n            if(s[i]=='0'){s[i]=v[a++];}\n        }\n        return s;\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sort-vowels-in-a-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
